name: Rainbow Harvest
birth_place: New York City, New York, USA
introduction: Little is known about the lovely actress who appeared in films from the mid-1980s to the early 1990s. Many are surprised to know that her real name is indeed "Rainbow Harvest". She attended Charette Public (elementary) School 3 in New York from 1972-1978. She next attended New York Intermediary School 70 until 1980. From there, she was accepted in the prestigious Performing Arts High School in New York, Graduating in 1985. Rainbow debuted in her first film role at the age of sixteen, winning a leading role in "Old Enough" (1984). After a very successful film career in her teens and early twenties, she left the world of feature films.- IMDb Mini Biography By: Irishlass240 (smmorr240@aol.com)She is married to actor Kevin Wixted whom she met on the set of 21 Jump Street. She has obtained two degrees (Bachelor of Arts, and Master of Science in Management and Organizational Behaviour) from Benedictine University. She has lived in the Greater Chicago Area since 2005, and worked for Otis Elevator Company since 2003, having been recruited from Universal Studios as a result of her professional dealings with Otis Elevator Company.- IMDb Mini Biography By: B Patterson
